original_text: and when all the flocks were gathered there, the shepherds would roll the stone from the mouth of the well and water the sheep, and put the stone back in its place over the mouth of the well.
korean_text: 모든 떼가 모이면 그들이 우물 아귀에서 돌을 옮기고 그 양 떼에게 물을 먹이고는 우물 아귀 그 자리에 다시 그 돌을 덮더라

sentences.original_text: when all the flocks were gathered there
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 양 떼들이 그곳에 모였을 때

sentences.original_text: the shepherds would roll the stone
from the mouth of the well
in its place over the mouth of the well
